abstract: Keith Canton, formerly of Lehman Brothers and Barclays, will become head of private capital markets at the bank.
snippet: Keith Canton, formerly of Lehman Brothers and Barclays, will become head of private capital markets at the bank.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase has hired a senior banker to lead the firm’s effort to provide private financing for companies like hot Silicon Valley start-ups, the bank announced in an internal memorandum on Monday.

headline.main: JPMorgan Hires Banker for Private Financing

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Private Placements (Non-Public Offerings) and Mini IPOs

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
